name: Treasure Hunters
background: The Guilds of the Nexus are various factions of violent and deranged outlaws that wage eternal guild wars on the streets of the Nexus. These guilds are joined by mercenaries which are not bound to any particular guild, and which fight for anyone that can provide riches or a worthy cause.

sections.label: Replace Heavy Throwing Weapon and Hand Weapon

options.label: Heavy Throwing Weapon (12", A1, AP(1)), Dagger (A2)

sections.label: Replace Throwing Weapon and Hand Weapon

spells.name: Adrenaline Rush
spells.effect: Pick up to two friendly units within 12", which get Runner Boost once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (params.aura ? this.AuraSize : 1), avgUnit: !params.thisUnit }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Swooping Attack
spells.effect: Pick one enemy unit within 12", which takes 2 hits with AP(1) and Crack. Roll as many dice as hits to see if "on rolls of 6" effects trigger.

parameters.name: spellHitRoll
parameters.value: Roll as many dice as hits to see if "on rolls of 6" effects trigger.

spellHitRoll.name: Roll as many dice as hits to see if "on rolls of 6" effects trigger.

spells.name: Hunting Potion
spells.effect: Pick up to four enemy units within 18", which friendly units get +1 to hit rolls in melee against once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value:
var range = params.effect.attackType?.value ?? 24;
return (this.getWeaponCost({ attacks: 1.5, range }, { quality: 5 - params.effect.rollModifier.value }) - this.getWeaponCost({ attacks: 1.5, range }, { quality: 5 }))

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Raven Dart
spells.effect: Pick up to two enemy units within 6", which take 1 hit with AP(2) and Deadly(3) each.

spells.name: Dark Shadow
spells.effect: Pick up to six friendly units within 12", which get Stealth once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (params.aura ? this.AuraSize : 1), avgUnit: !params.thisUnit }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Death from Above
spells.effect: Pick up to three enemy units within 12", which take 3 hits each.

specialRules.name: Melee Shrouding Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Melee Shrouding. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Piercing Spotter
specialRules.description: Once per activation, pick one enemy unit within 36" and in line of sight of this model and roll one die, on a 4+ place a marker on it. When attacking, friendly units may remove markers from their target before rolling to block to get +AP(X), where X is the number of removed markers.

specialRules.name: Precise
specialRules.description: Gets +1 to hit when attacking.

specialRules.name: Repel Ambushers
specialRules.description: Enemy units using Ambush must be set up over 12" away from this model's unit.

specialRules.name: Shred
specialRules.description: On unmodified results of 1 to block hits, this weapon deals 1 extra wound.

specialRules.name: Melee Slayer
specialRules.description: This model's melee weapons get AP(+2) against units where most models have Tough(3) or higher.

specialRules.name: Runner
specialRules.description: Moves +2" when using Advance, and +2 when using Rush/Charge.

specialRules.name: Runner Boost Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Runner Boost. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Furious Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Furious. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Relentless Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Relentless. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Precision Fighting Mark
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick up to 4 enemy units within 18", which friendly units get +1 to hit rolls in melee against once (next time the effect would apply).

specialRules.name: Crack
specialRules.description: On unmodified results of 6 to hit, those hits get AP(+2).

specialRules.name: Courage Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get +1 to morale test rolls. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Melee Shrouding
specialRules.description: Enemies get -3" movement when trying to charge units where all models have this rule.

specialRules.name: AP
specialRules.description: Targets get -X to Defense rolls when blocking hits.

specialRules.name: Ambush
specialRules.description: May be set aside before deployment. At the start of any round after the first, may be deployed anywhere over 9 away from enemy units. Players alternate in placing Ambush units, starting with the player that activates next. Units that deploy via Ambush cant seize or contest objectives on the round they deploy.

specialRules.name: Tough
specialRules.description: This model only rolls to check wound effects once it has taken at least X wounds, and is only Knocked Out on rolls of 5+X or more.

specialRules.name: Runner Boost
specialRules.description: If this model has Runner, it moves +4" on Advance and +4" on Rush/Charge from Runner (instead of only +2" and +2").

specialRules.name: Furious
specialRules.description: When charging, unmodified results of 6 to hit in melee deal 1 extra hit (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

specialRules.name: Relentless
specialRules.description: When this model shoots at enemies over 9" away, unmodified results of 6 to hit deal 1 extra hit (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

specialRules.name: Deadly
specialRules.description: Assign each wound to one model, and multiply it by X. Hits from Deadly must be resolved first, and these wounds dont carry over to other models if the original target is killed.

specialRules.name: Stealth
specialRules.description: When units where all models have this rule are shot from over 9" away, enemy units get -1 to hit rolls.
